# Base64 handling functions

this is a sample of 2 functions:
1. cert_b64
2. cert_string

These functions help with a common issue when passing in certificates as data values.

Many end users get confused and dont know if they should supply a certificate as a multiline string or in Base64 encoding.

## cert_b64
This function enables converting a certificate to base64 encoding if it is recieved as a multiline string and otherwise returns the value it recieved

## cert_string
This function if the input is a multiline string simply returns it, otherwise it base64 decodes the input variable

## Sample Data Values file
```yaml
#@data/values
---
cert_as_b64: 
cert_as_string: |
  -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
  MIIDTDCCAjSgAwIBAgIQTWMwZOE9BHascglX/8joBDANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQsFADAt
  MRcwFQYDVQQKEw5Qcm9qZWN0IEhhcmJvcjESMBAGA1UEAxMJSGFyYm9yIENBMB4X

  dCBIYXJib3IxDzANBgNVBAMTBmhhcmJvcjCCASIwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEBBQADggEP
  ADCCAQoCggEBAMWsAccHG/LnWDbvj0jhHFQ/ifYIbP3bcMLAHNkWRYCXqjGg48C7
```
